name: Jam Out! (dis_da_moe)
description:
Dodge bullets while trying to melee enemies in this band-themed 2D game! Single use abilities to fit the theme

Made by two people over the course of 6 days for the GJL game jam

All art by Steph Ramos:

https://sramosdraws.wixsite.com/mysite

Programmed by dis_da_moe:

https://dis-da-moe.carrd.co/

We hope you enjoy this as much as we've enjoyed making it!
